Detailed Description

The abstract base class of all the provider implementations.

Member Function Documentation

LcsErrorCode LcsProviderImplBase::AbortSelfLocReq (   )  [static]
 

This method sends aborts a self-location request as follows: 1. A pending self-location request is simply removed 2. An ongoing self-location request operating in MS-based mode is aborted by sending an abort request to the Lcs stack

static LastLocationEstimate LcsProviderImplBase::GetLastKnownLocation (   )  [inline, static]
 

This method returns the result (location estimate) of the most recent MO-LR.

Returns the transport protocol supported by the provider implementation.
